metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26118 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Versions of the package angular from 1.4.9 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the <input type="url"> element due to the usage of an insecure regular expression in the input[url] functionality. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible by a large carefully-crafted input, which can result in catastrophic backtracking.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> There is no upstream fix for this issue as of 2023-05-15

criterions.comment: angular.js package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-05-15').
